pages.text: $(o)"When the beginning died and the end was forgotten, in the oldest war, a man pledged alliance to the Sun. The second human to rise is clothed in blue, and walks the Wake with sword and shield. With him we fight, for all his struggles are eternal as the Angel, though masks never show true smiles."$()

pages.title: Symbol
pages.text: This symbol is created with a $(item)Diamond Sword$() in the $(l:glory/entry_rite_glorious)Glorious Rite$().$(br)When active, this statue will provide strength to every player nearby, and will increase Magan regeneration slightly.
